hero.title: Our Approach
hero.subtitle: We follow a thoughtful approach to designing a solution that fits your needs

intro.title: Strategic Groundwork for Successful Annotation
intro.subtitle: Designing the Process
intro.paragraph1: We believe that successful data annotation and processing starts with a deep understanding of the problem space and a carefully designed workflow.
intro.paragraph2: Our approach ensures that the final outcome is not just "labelled data", but a strategic data asset that powers long-term machine learning and operational success.
intro.paragraph3: By thinking ahead and planning for integration, future updates, and long-term use, we build data solutions that continue to deliver value well beyond the initial project.

needsAssessment.title: Needs Assessment
needsAssessment.subtitle: We don't just accept data — we interrogate it.
needsAssessment.description: Every engagement starts with a deep-dive assessment led by our cross-functional team of data scientists and annotation architects.

useCase.title: Use Case Discovery
useCase.description: Map out model objectives and business value to guide data strategy

dataAudit.title: Data Audit & Profiling
dataAudit.description: Identify gaps, anomalies, and schema inconsistencies

labelStrategy.title: Label Strategy Definition
labelStrategy.description: Co-create a label set, ontology, and annotation policy tailored to your domain

teamWork.swiss: Our Swiss team leads structured assessments and defines annotation KPIs and data readiness benchmarks
teamWork.namibian: Our Namibian team conducts dataset exploration, metadata mapping, and prepares datasets for pipeline ingestion

customDesign.title: Custom Annotation Design
customDesign.subtitle: Once the goals are clear, we design an annotation workflow that reflects both the complexity of the task and the structure of your data.

workflow.title: Workflow Design
workflow.description: Design end-to-end annotation pipelines (task creation, labelling, validation, QA, and approval) using flexible platforms

quality.title: Quality Controls
quality.description: Implement multi-layered quality checks including consensus scoring, gold standard tasks and blind reviews

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Configure the pipeline to integrate with your infrastructure for task dispatching and cloud storage sync

teamWork.swiss: Our Swiss team sets up control and measurement systems using annotation benchmarks
teamWork.namibian: Our Namibian team operationalizes the workflow, ensuring flexibility for daily QA feedback loops

architecture.title: Future-Proofed Data Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Data labelling is an investment. We ensure it continues to yield returns by embedding reusability, traceability, and extensibility into the output.

formats.title: Standardized Output Formats
formats.description: Deliver in ML-ready formats like COCO, JSONL, TFRecord, or Pascal VOC

version.title: Version Control
version.description: Track dataset iterations and changes using tools like DVC or Git-based systems

retraining.title: Retraining Readiness
retraining.description: Design feedback loops for future annotation cycles and model fine-tuning

teamWork.swiss: Our Swiss team defines output architecture, schema governance, and compliance-ready data documentation
teamWork.namibian: Our Namibian team ensures versioning, traceability, and consistent data delivery through managed pipelines

humanInLoop.title: Human in the Loop
humanInLoop.subtitle: We believe annotation is not a mechanical task — it's a cognitive skill.
humanInLoop.description: Our Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) model enables contextual, high-quality annotations.

training.title: Domain-Specific Training
training.description: Annotators are trained in the nuances of the industry (legal, medical, retail, etc.)

collaboration.title: Human-AI Collaboration
collaboration.description: Combine pre-annotations, model suggestions, and manual corrections

feedback.title: Feedback-Driven Improvement
feedback.description: Use performance reviews and disagreement analysis to continuously raise annotation quality

teamWork.swiss: Our Swiss team sets review policies and manages continuous learning from model outcomes
teamWork.namibian: Our Namibian team executes annotation with quality-first discipline, escalating ambiguities and refining work
